00028 //Memory allocation / freeing for crabat
00029 //This appeared to speed up processing time;
00030 //however, no benchmarks were taken
00031 
00032 #include <TH2.h>
00033 #include <TH3.h>

00035 
00041 void Usage() {
00042   fprintf(stderr, "\nrun processes the data analysis\n");
00043   fprintf(stderr, "Must analyze at least one data type (raw and/or detailed)\n");
00044   fprintf(stderr, "Must analyze at least one detector type (ssd, strip, ppac, tpc)\n");
00045   fprintf(stderr, "Copyright 2011 daid KAHL (and others, see AUTHORS)\n");
00046   fprintf(stderr, "Usage: run [-R RunNumber] [-B ] [-H header] [-I path] [-r ] [-d ] [-s ] [-x ] [-p ] [-t ]\n");
00047   fprintf(stderr, "Description of options:\n");
00048   fprintf(stderr, "  -R <int>\t: Call run on RunNumber <int> (can be entered manually at runtime also)\n");
00049   fprintf(stderr, "  -B\t\t: Call run in non-interactive Batch mode.  Requires -R flag.\n");
00050   fprintf(stderr, "  -H <string>\t: Use run header <string> instead of run header in run.conf\n");
00051   fprintf(stderr, "  -I <string>\t: Use ROOT Tree input directory path <string> instead of reading from run.conf\n");
00052   fprintf(stderr, "  -r\t\t: Raw data histograms\n");
00053   fprintf(stderr, "  -d\t\t: Detailed data histograms\n");
00054   fprintf(stderr, "  -s\t\t: Analyze SSD pad data\n");
00055   fprintf(stderr, "  -x\t\t: Analyze SSD strip data\n");
00056   fprintf(stderr, "  -p\t\t: Analyze PPAC data\n");
00057   fprintf(stderr, "  -t\t\t: Analyze TPC data\n");
00058 };
00059 
00060 
00061 // read any arguments passed to run at runtime
00062 // Never change these here!
00063 Bool_t flag_Run = false; // flag_Run controls automated mode (no user input)
00064 Bool_t flag_Batch = false; // controls Batch mode - must be used with -R flag as well
00065 Bool_t flag_Header = false; // pass a header rather than read it from run.conf
00066 Bool_t flag_Inpath = false; // pass the ROOT Tree Input Path (directory) rather than read from run.conf
00067 Bool_t flag_raw=false, flag_detail=false;
00068 Bool_t flag_ssd=false, flag_strip=false, flag_ppac=false, flag_tpc=false;

00191 void HistInit(){ // histogram initalization
00192    
00193   char name[100];
00194   
00195   if (flag_ssd){ 
00196     
00197     if (flag_raw){ 
00198        //hSiPadHit goes here
00199       hSiPadHit = new TH1F("hSiPadHit","hSiPadHit",18,-0.5,17.5);
00200       hSiT = new TH2F("hSiT","hSiT",18,-0.5,17.5, 30000,0.,30000.);
00201       hSiT->SetOption("COL");
00202       hSiPadE = new TH2F("hSiPadE","hSiPadE",18,-0.5,17.5, 410,0.,4100.);
00203       hSiPadE->SetOption("COL");   
00204       for (UShort_t i=0;i<18;i++) {
00205         sprintf(name,"pad_ch%d",i);
00206         pad_ch[i]= new TH1F(name, name, 3950,50,4000);
00207       } 
00208     } // end if: flag_raw
00209     
00210     if (flag_detail){
00211       hSiTcal = new TH2F("hSiTcal","hSiTcal",18,-0.5,17.5, 30000,0.,30000.);
00212       hSiTcal->SetOption("COL");
00213       hSiPadEcal = new TH2F("hSiPadEcal","hSiPadEcal",18,-0.5,17.5, 410,0.,4100.);
00214     } // end if: flag_detail
00215     
00216   } // end if: flag_ssd
00217   
00218   if (flag_strip) {
00219   
00220     if (flag_raw){
00221       hSiStripHit = new TH1F("hSiStripHit","hSiStripHit",96,-0.5,95.5);
00222       hSiStripE = new TH2F("hSiStripE","hSiStripE",96,.5,96.5, 410,0.,4100.);
00223       hSiStripE->SetOption("COL");
00224       for (UShort_t i=1;i<97;i++) {
00225         sprintf(name,"strip_ch%d",i);
00226         strip_ch[i]= new TH1F(name, name, 4096,0,4096);
00227       }
00228     } // end if: flag_raw
00229   
00230     if (flag_detail){
00231       hSiStripEcal = new TH2F("hSiStripEcal","hSiStripEcal",96,-0.5,95.5, 400,0.,20.);
00232       hSiEmax = new TH2F("hSiEmax","hSiEmax",12,-0.5,11.5, 410,0.,4100.);
00233       hSiEmax->SetOption("COL");
00234       for (UShort_t i=1;i<97;i++) {
00235         sprintf(name,"strip_cal_ch%d",i);
00236         strip_cal_ch[i]= new TH1F(name, name, 300,0,30);
00237       }
00238     } // end if: flag_detail
00239 
00240   } // end if: flag_strip
00241   
00242   if (flag_detail && flag_ssd && flag_strip){
00243     for (UShort_t i=0;i<6;i++) {
00244       sprintf(name,"dE_E%d",i);
00245       dE_E[i]= new TH2F(name, name, 300,0.,30., 1000,0.,100.);
00246       dE_E[i]->SetOption("COL");
00247       sprintf(name,"dE_Estrip%d",i);
00248       dE_Estrip[i]= new TH2F(name, name, 300,0.,30., 1000,0.,100.);
00249       dE_Estrip[i]->SetOption("COL");
00250     }
00251 
00252   } // end if: flag_detail & flag_ssd & flag_strip
00253 
00254   if (flag_ppac){
00255   
00256     if(flag_raw){
00257       for (UShort_t i=0;i<2;i++){
00258         sprintf(name,"hRf%d",i);
00259         hRf[i] = new TH1F(name,name,1000,0,1000);
00260       }
00261       hPpac0TX1 = new TH1F("hPpac0TX1","hPpac0TX1",22000,0.,22000.);
00262       hPpac0TX2 = new TH1F("hPpac0TX2","hPpac0TX2",22000,0.,22000.);
00263       hPpac0TY1 = new TH1F("hPpac0TY1","hPpac0TY1",22000,0.,22000.);
00264       hPpac0TY2 = new TH1F("hPpac0TY2","hPpac0TY2",22000,0.,22000.);
00265       hPpac1TX1 = new TH1F("hPpac1TX1","hPpac1TX1",22000,0.,22000.);
00266       hPpac1TX2 = new TH1F("hPpac1TX2","hPpac1TX2",22000,0.,22000.);
00267       hPpac1TY1 = new TH1F("hPpac1TY1","hPpac1TY1",22000,0.,22000.);
00268       hPpac1TY2 = new TH1F("hPpac1TY2","hPpac1TY2",22000,0.,22000.);
00269     } // end if: flag_raw
00270     
00271     if (flag_detail){
00272       hRF0Tof = new TH2F("hRF0Tof","RF0 vs. PPAC Tof",600,0.,600.,200,0.,20.);
00273       hRF0Tof->SetOption("COL");
00274       hRF0Tof->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("RF (arb)");
00275       hRF0Tof->GetXaxis()->CenterTitle(true);
00276       hRF0Tof->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Time of Flight (ns)");
00277       hRF0Tof->GetYaxis()->CenterTitle(true);
00278       
00279       hRF1Tof = new TH2F("hRF1Tof","RF1 vs. PPAC Tof",600,0.,600.,200,0.,20.);
00280       hRF1Tof->SetOption("COL");
00281       hRF1Tof->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("RF (arb)");
00282       hRF1Tof->GetXaxis()->CenterTitle(true);
00283       hRF1Tof->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Time of Flight (ns)");
00284       hRF1Tof->GetYaxis()->CenterTitle(true);
00285       
00286       hPpac0XY = new TH2F("hPpac0XY","PPACa X vs. Y",160,-40.,40.,160,-40.,40.);
00287       hPpac0XY->SetOption("COL");
00288       hPpac0XY->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("X Position (mm)");
00289       hPpac0XY->GetXaxis()->CenterTitle(true);
00290       hPpac0XY->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Y Position (mm)");
00291       hPpac0XY->GetYaxis()->CenterTitle(true);
00292       
00293       hPpac1XY = new TH2F("hPpac1XY","PPACb X vs. Y",160,-40.,40.,160,-40.,40.);
00294       hPpac1XY->SetOption("COL");   
00295       hPpac1XY->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("X Position (mm)");
00296       hPpac1XY->GetXaxis()->CenterTitle(true);
00297       hPpac1XY->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Y Position (mm)");
00298       hPpac1XY->GetYaxis()->CenterTitle(true);
00299       
00300       hPpac1XYcut = new TH2F("hPpac1XYcut","PPACb X vs. Y",160,-40.,40.,160,-40.,40.);
00301       hPpac1XYcut->SetOption("COL");   
00302       hPpac1XYcut->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("X Position (mm)");
00303       hPpac1XYcut->GetXaxis()->CenterTitle(true);
00304       hPpac1XYcut->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Y Position (mm)");
00305       hPpac1XYcut->GetYaxis()->CenterTitle(true);
00306       
00307       hPpac0XRF0 = new TH2F("hPpac0XRF0","PPACa X vs. RF0",160,-40.,40.,600,0.,600.);
00308       hPpac0XRF0->SetOption("COL");
00309       hPpac0XRF0->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("X Position (mm)");
00310       hPpac0XRF0->GetXaxis()->CenterTitle(true);
00311       hPpac0XRF0->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("RF (arb)");
00312       hPpac0XRF0->GetYaxis()->CenterTitle(true);
00313

00315       hPpac0XRF1->SetOption("COL");
00316       hPpac0XRF1->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("X Position (mm)");
00317       hPpac0XRF1->GetXaxis()->CenterTitle(true);

00625 
00631 void HistWrite() {
00632   // WRITE THE HISTOGRAMS
00633 
00634   if (flag_ssd) { // process SSD?
00635     if (flag_raw) { // write the SSD pad raw histograms
00636       hSiT->Write(); 
00637       hSiPadE->Write(); 
00638       hSiPadHit->Write();  
00639       for (UShort_t i=0;i<18;i++) {
00640          pad_ch[i]->Write();
00641       } // end for : i
00642     } // end if: flag_raw
00643     
00644     if (flag_detail) { // write the SSD pad detailed histograms
00645       hSiTcal->Write(); 
00646       hSiPadEcal->Write();
00647     } // end if: flag_detail
00648   } //end if: flag_ssd
00649 
00650   if(flag_strip){
00651     if (flag_raw){ // write the SSD strip raw histograms
00652       hSiStripE->Write(); 
00653       hSiStripHit->Write(); 
00654       for (UShort_t i=1;i<97;i++) {
00655          strip_ch[i]->Write();
00656        }
00657     } // end if: flag_raw
00658     
00659     if (flag_detail){ // write the SSD strip detailed histograms
00660       hSiEmax->Write(); 
00661       for (UShort_t i=1;i<97;i++) {
00662          strip_cal_ch[i]->Write();
00663       }
00664     } // end if : flag_detail
00665   } //end if: flag_strip
00666 
00667   if (flag_detail && flag_ssd && flag_strip){
00668       for (UShort_t i=0;i<6;i++) {
00669          dE_E[i]->Write();
00670          dE_Estrip[i]->Write();
00671       }
00672   } // end if: flag_detail & flag_ssd & flag_strip
00673 
00674   if (flag_ppac){ // process PPAC?
00675     if (flag_raw) { // write the PPAC raw histograms
00676        for (UShort_t i=0;i<2;i++) hRf[i]->Write();
00677        hPpac0TX1->Write();
00678        hPpac0TX2->Write();
00679        hPpac0TY1->Write();
00680        hPpac0TY2->Write();
00681        hPpac1TX1->Write();
00682        hPpac1TX2->Write();
00683        hPpac1TY1->Write();
00684        hPpac1TY2->Write();
00685     } // end if: flag_raw
00686 
00687     if (flag_detail) { // write the PPAC detailed histograms
00688        hRF0Tof->Write();
00689        hRF1Tof->Write();
00690        hPpac0XY->Write();
00691        hPpac1XY->Write();  
00692        hPpac1XYcut->Write();  
00693        hPpac0XRF0->Write(); 
00694        hPpac1XRF0->Write(); 
00695        hPpac0XRF1->Write(); 
00696        hPpac0XRF1cut->Write(); 
00697        hPpac1XRF1cut->Write(); 
00698        hPpac1XRF1->Write();
00699        hPpac0XRF0_29p->Write(); 
00700        hPpac0XRF1_29p->Write(); 
00701        hPpac0XRF0_30s->Write(); 
00702        hPpac0XRF1_30s->Write(); 
00703        hPpac1XRF0_29p->Write(); 
00704        hPpac1XRF1_29p->Write(); 
00705        hPpac1XRF0_30s->Write(); 
00706        hPpac1XRF1_30s->Write(); 
00707     } // end if: flag_detail
00708   } // end if: flag_ppac
00709 
00710   if (flag_ssd && flag_ppac){ // process PPAC & SSD?
00711     if (flag_detail) { // write PPAC / SSD detailed histograms
00712        hPpac0XRF0ds->Write(); 
00713        hPpac0XRF1ds->Write(); 
00714        hPpac0XRF0ssd->Write(); 
00715        hPpac0XRF1ssd->Write(); 
00716        hPpac1XRF0ds->Write(); 
00717        hPpac1XRF1ds->Write(); 
00718        hPpac1XRF0ssd->Write(); 
00719        hPpac1XRF1ssd->Write(); 
00720        hPpacToF_30s->Write();
00721        hPpacToF_29p->Write();
00722        for (UShort_t i=0;i<18;i++){
00723          hPpac0TpadT_30s_ch[i]->Write();
00724          hPpac0TpadT_29p_ch[i]->Write();
00725        }
00726     } // end if: flag_detail
00727   } // end if: flag_ssd & flag_ppac
00728 
00729   if (flag_tpc) { // process TPC?
00730     if (flag_raw) { // write TPC raw histograms
00731        hGemMstpcAll->Write();
00732        hGemMstpcSide->Write();
00733        hGemMstpcCh->Write();
00734        hBeamPadCh->Write();
00735        for (UShort_t i=0;i<144;i++) {
00736           hfSample[i]->Write();
00737           hTpc_dE_ch[i]->Write();
00738        }
00739     } // end if: flag_raw
00740     if (flag_detail) { // write TPC detailed histograms
00741        //hPadC->Write();
00742        hBraggB->Write();
00743        hBraggL->Write();
00744        hBraggR->Write();
00745        hBraggC->Write();
00746        hPadXB->Write();
00747        hPadXB_30s->Write();
00748        hPadYB->Write();
00749        hPadYB_30s->Write();
00750        hPadXC->Write();
00751        hBraggB_rp->Write();
00752        hBraggB_30s->Write();
00753        hBraggB_3D->Write();
00754        hBraggB_3D_ds->Write();
00755        hBraggB_3D_ssd->Write();
00756        hPadB_3D->Write();
00757        //hBraggB_30s2->Write();
00758        hBraggB_29p->Write();
00759        //hBraggB_31s->Write();
00760        for (UShort_t i=0;i<144;i++) {
00761           hTrough[i]->Write();
00762           if (i<48){
00763             hBraggB_ch[i]->Write();
00764             hBraggB_ds_ch[i]->Write();
00765             hBraggB_ssd_ch[i]->Write();
00766           }
00767           if (i<15) hBraggB_30s_jch[i]->Write();
00768        }
00769     } // end if: flag_detail
00770   } // end if: flag_tpc
00771 
00772 } // close HistWrite

00781 void HistClean(){ // function to free histogram memory
00782   delete hSiStripHit ;
00783   delete hSiPadHit ;
00784   delete hBeamPadCh ;
00785   delete hGemMstpcCh ;
00786   delete hSiStripE ;
00787   delete hSiStripEcal ;
00788   delete hSiPadE ;
00789   delete hSiEmax ;
00790   delete hSiPadEcal ;
00791   delete dE_EBeamGateRFAll ;
00792   delete hSiT ;
00793   delete hSiTcal ;
00794   delete hRF0Tof;
00795   delete hRF1Tof;
00796   delete hPpac0TX1;
00797   delete hPpac0TX2;
00798   delete hPpac0TY1;
00799   delete hPpac0TY2;
00800   delete hPpac1TX1;
00801   delete hPpac1TX2;
00802   delete hPpac1TY1;
00803   delete hPpac1TY2;
00804   delete hPpac0XY ;
00805   delete hPpac1XY ;
00806   delete hPpac1XYcut ;
00807   delete hPpac0XRF0 ;
00808   delete hPpac0XRF0_29p ;
00809   delete hPpac0XRF1_29p ;
00810   delete hPpac0XRF0_30s ;
00811   delete hPpac0XRF1_30s ;
00812   delete hPpac0XRF0ds ;
00813   delete hPpac0XRF1ds ;
00814   delete hPpac0XRF0ssd ;
00815   delete hPpac0XRF1ssd ;
00816   delete hPpac1XRF0 ;
00817   delete hPpac1XRF0_29p ;
00818   delete hPpac1XRF1_29p ;
00819   delete hPpac1XRF0_30s ;
00820   delete hPpac1XRF1_30s ;
00821   delete hPpac1XRF0ds ;
00822   delete hPpac1XRF1ds ;
00823   delete hPpac1XRF0ssd ;
00824   delete hPpac1XRF1ssd ;
00825   delete hPpac0XRF1 ;
00826   delete hPpac0XRF1cut ;
00827   delete hPpac1XRF1cut ;
00828   delete hPpac1XRF1 ;
00829   delete hGemMstpcAll ;
00830   delete hGemMstpcSide ;
00831   delete hBraggB_30s ;
00832   delete hPadXB ;
00833   delete hPadXB_30s ;
00834   delete hPadYB ;
00835   delete hPadYB_30s ;
00836   delete hBraggB_3D ;
00837   delete hBraggB_3D_ds ;
00838   delete hBraggB_3D_ssd ;
00839   delete hPadB_3D;
00840   delete hBraggB_29p ;
00841   delete hBraggB_31s ;
00842   delete hBraggB ;
00843   delete hBraggL ;
00844   delete hBraggR ;
00845   delete hBraggC ;
00846   delete hBraggB_rp;
00847   for (int i=0;i<2;i++) delete hRf[i]; 
00848   for (int j=0;j<15;j++) delete hBraggB_30s_jch[j];
00849   for (int i=0;i<97;i++){
00850     delete strip_ch[i];
00851     delete strip_cal_ch[i];
00852     delete strip_ch_gated30s[i];
00853     delete strip_ch_gated29p[i];
00854   }
00855   delete hPpacToF_30s;
00856   delete hPpacToF_29p;
00857   for (int i=0;i<18;i++){
00858     delete pad_ch[i];
00859     delete hPpac0TpadT_30s_ch[i];
00860     delete hPpac0TpadT_29p_ch[i];
00861     delete pad_ch_gated[i];
00862   }
00863   for (int i=0;i<6;i++){
00864     delete dE_E[i];
00865     delete dE_Estrip[i];
00866     delete dE_EBeamGateRF0[i];
00867     delete dE_EBeamGateRF1[i];
00868   }
00869   for (int i=0;i<144;i++){
00870     delete hfSample[i]; 
00871     delete hTrough[i];
00872     delete hTpc_dE_ch[i];
00873   }
00874   for (int i=0;i<48;i++){
00875     delete hBraggB_ch[i];
00876     delete hBraggB_ds_ch[i];
00877     delete hBraggB_ssd_ch[i];
00878   }
00879 } // close HistClean
